facts: The word 'quiz' was allegedly invented in 1780 by a Dublin theater manager as a bet! 🎭
Bubble wrap was originally invented as wallpaper! 🫧
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is 13 seconds 🐔
A single strand of spaghetti is called a 'spaghetto' 🍝
The dot over a lowercase 'i' or 'j' is called a tittle! 📝
Banging your head against a wall burns 150 calories per hour 💀
The unicorn is Scotland's national animal 🦄
You can't lick your own elbow (most people just tried this!) 👅
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out 🐊
Peanuts aren't actually nuts - they're legumes! 🥜
The human nose can detect over 1 trillion different scents 👃
Goats have rectangular pupils 🐐
A group of ferrets is called a 'business' 🦫
The shortest complete sentence in English is 'I am' ✨
Your foot is the same length as the distance between your elbow and wrist 📏
Slugs have 4 noses 🐌
The word 'set' has the most different meanings in English 📚
A jiffy is an actual unit of time - 1/100th of a second ⏰
Almonds are a member of the peach family 🍑
The plastic thing on the end of shoelaces is called an aglet 👟
Cats can't taste sweetness 🐱
The fear of long words is called hippopotomonstrosesquippedaliophobia 😰
A baby octopus is about the size of a flea when it's born 🐙
The average person spends 6 months of their life waiting for red lights ⛔
Otters hold hands while sleeping so they don't drift apart 🦦
